participant_1.background:
I remember my mother reading to me every night before bed.
I remember buying my first house with my husband.
i love to crochet.
i recently moved to sweden.
my favorite music artist is isaiah rashad.

participant_2.background:
I made a lot of changes to my diet and exercise habits and I'm proud of my progress.
i spend a lot of time driving my kids to sports events.
my mother has 500 pairs of shoes.
I go running to stay fit and it helps me clear my mind after a long day at work.
i am a librarian in my current job.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! How are you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I just moved to Sweden and I'm really enjoying it here.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to visit Sweden. What's your favorite thing about it so far?
I love the people here. They're so friendly and welcoming.
That's great to hear! I'm sure they're happy to have you there.
I think so too! I've been crocheting a lot lately. It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
That's awesome! I love to crochet too. I'm actually working on a blanket right now.
That's great! What kind of blanket are you making?
It's a granny square blanket. It's a little bit tricky, but it's coming along nicely.
That sounds really cool! I've never made a granny square blanket before.
It's not too hard, but it does take a little bit of time.
I'm sure it'll be worth it when it's finished.
I hope so! I'm definitely going to need a new blanket for the winter.
Me too! I'm not sure how I'm going to survive the cold without one.
We'll just have to snuggle up together and stay warm.
That sounds like a great plan
